function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Collection of images from different sources","Impact":"Inaccurate images may lead to biased training and testing of the model, affecting model performance","Mitigation":"Verify the authenticity and accuracy of the images before using them for training and testing","Technologies":"Image verification and validation tools","People":"Data collection team, developers","Owner":"Data collection team, development team"},{"Description":"Dependence on Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) architecture","Impact":"Ineffective feature extraction and classification, leading to inaccurate predictions","Mitigation":"Regularly evaluate the performance of the CNN architecture and consider alternative architectures for comparison","Technologies":"CNN performance evaluation tools, alternative deep learning architectures","People":"Data scientists, machine learning engineers","Owner":"Data science team, machine learning team"},{"Description":"Risk of overfitting in the neural network","Impact":"Reduced generalization capability, leading to poor performance on new and unseen data","Mitigation":"Implement dropout layers, use regularization techniques, and cross-validation to prevent overfitting","Technologies":"Dropout layers, regularization techniques, cross-validation tools","People":"Machine learning engineers, data scientists","Owner":"Machine learning team"}]}
